To support the responsible discovery, development and production of gold and copper, we engage in a variety of ways
with industry, business, education and research, and other non-government organisations, including through memberships. This includes the International Council on Mining and Metals (ICMM) Performance Expectations, and the World Gold Council (WGC) Responsible Gold Mining Principles.
